os.name: Microsoft Windows
os.description: A widely used operating system known for its graphical user interface and compatibility with a vast range of software applications.

os.name: Apple macOS
os.description: A sophisticated operating system designed specifically for Apple's Macintosh computers, known for its sleek design and usability.

os.name: Linux
os.description: An open-source operating system kernel that has various distributions like Ubuntu, Fedora, and CentOS, known for its customizability and security.
